briefdescription.para: Returns a list of the model names that are assigned to the source .

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<T> representing the class model names assigned to the object class.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, string modelName, bool throwException=true)
memberdef.name: GetField

briefdescription.para: Finds the IField that has been assigned the modelName that is within the specified source .

parameterdescription.para: The object class to check for model names
if set to true if an exception should be thrown when the model name is not assigned.

simplesect.para: Returns the ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IField that has been assigned the model name.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, string modelName, bool throwException=true)
memberdef.name: GetFieldIndex

briefdescription.para: Finds index of the IField that has been assigned the modelName that is within the specified source .

parameterdescription.para: if set to true if an exception should be thrown when the model name is not assigned.

simplesect.para: Returns the int representing the index of the field assigned the model name.

briefdescription.para: Gets a dictionary of the fields that are assigned the modelNames organized by the model name followed by the field indexes.

simplesect.para: Returns the Dictionary<Key, Value> representing the field model name for the field indexes.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, int subtypeCode, IMMAuxiliaryFieldBuilder auxiliaryFieldBuilder=null)
memberdef.name: GetFieldManager

briefdescription.para: Gets the field manager for the specified source

simplesect.para: Returns the IMMFieldManager representing the properties for the class.

briefdescription.para: Returns a dictionary of the fields and model names that are assigned to the field for the specified source .

simplesect.para: Returns a Dictionary<Key, Value> representing the model names assigned to the field.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of the model names that are assigned to the field for the specified source .

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<T> representing the model names assigned to the field.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, string modelName, bool throwException=true)
memberdef.name: GetFieldName

briefdescription.para: Returns the name of the field that is assigned the modelName on the source .

parameterdescription.para: if set to true if an exception should be thrown when the model name is not assigned.

simplesect.para: Returns a string representing the name of the field, otherwise null.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of the name of the fields that are assigned the specified modelName on the particiular source .

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<T> representing the name of the fields that are assigned the field model name.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of the name of the fields that are assigned the specified modelNames on the particiular source .

simplesect.para: Returns a IEnumerable<T> representing the name of the fields that are assigned the field model name.

briefdescription.para: Gets all of the fields that has been assigned the modelNames that is within the specified source .

parameterdescription.para: The object class to check for model names

simplesect.para: Returns the IEnumerable<IField> that has been assigned the model name.

briefdescription.para: Get the value of field that has been configured to be the primary display field.

simplesect.para: Returns a IField representing the field for the primary display.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, esriRelRole relationshipRole, string modelName, bool throwException=true)
memberdef.name: GetRelationshipClass

briefdescription.para: Finds the IRelationshipClass using the specified source and relationshipRole that has been assigned the modelName .

parameterdescription.para: if set to true if an exception should be thrown when the model name is not assigned.

simplesect.para: Returns a ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IRelationshipClass representing the relationship assigned any of the class model names, otherwise null.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, esriRelRole relationshipRole, string[] modelNames, bool throwException=true)
memberdef.name: GetRelationshipClass

briefdescription.para: Finds the IRelationshipClass using the specified source and relationshipRole that has been assigned any of the modelNames .

parameterdescription.para: if set to true if an exception should be thrown when the model name is not assigned.

simplesect.para: Returns a ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IRelationshipClass representing the relationship assigned any of the class model names, otherwise null.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, esriRelRole relationshipRole, params string[] modelNames)
memberdef.name: GetRelationshipClasses

briefdescription.para: Finds all of the relationship classes using the specified source and relationshipRole that has been assigned any of the modelNames .

simplesect.para: Returns a T:IList<ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IRelationshipClass> representing those relationships that are assigned one or more of the class model names.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the source contains any of the class model names specified in the modelName .

parameterdescription.para: The object class to check for model names

simplesect.para: Returns true if object class contains any of the class model name; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the source contains any of the class model names specified in the modelNames array.

parameterdescription.para: The object class to check for model names

simplesect.para: Returns true if object class contains any of the class model name; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the source contains any of the field model names specified in the modelName array.

parameterdescription.para: The object class to check for model names

simplesect.para: Returns true if object class contains any of the field model name; otherwise, false.

memberdef.argsstring: (this IObjectClass source, IField field, params string[] modelNames)
memberdef.name: IsAssignedFieldModelName

briefdescription.para: Determines if the field on the source contains any of the field model names specified in the modelNames array.

simplesect.para: true if object class contains any of the field model name; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the source contains any of the field model names specified in the modelNames array.

parameterdescription.para: The object class to check for model names

simplesect.para: Returns true if object class contains any of the field model name; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Provides extension methods for the ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IClass and ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IObjectClass interfaces.
